Bash(# Remove old helper functions from large_files.rs
sed -i '''' ''/\/\/ Helper function to get file objects from git (original version)/,/^}$/d'' src/large_files.rs

sed -i '''' ''/\/\/ Helper function to get object size (original version)/,/^}$/d'' src/large_files.rs
sed -i '''' ''/\/\/ Helper function to get object paths (original version)/,/^}$/d'' src/large_files.rs
sed -i '''' ''/\/\/ Fallback method to get object paths (original version)/,/^}$/d'' src/large_files.rs)
